info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: Everything was exactly as described by the listing. There were some issues with Bedbugs the first day we checked in but the owner took care of it right away. The place was clean and the caretakers were always responsive and friendly. definitely will stay again for my next visit. Thanks!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2023
rating_comment: Mr. Harun's place is quite big and centrally located. Very clean and tidy. He helped me sorting out an issue very quickly. He'sa generous man. We will come back again.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · October 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: I lived in the area myself for many years. I know the location and know what to expect. Perfect location for getting around the city for what ever purpose. Our stay was pleasant and care taker Jahid was very helpful. Can’t really complain. Only couple feedbacks - there was no coffee table in the living room which is a shame because everything else was alright. And also no AC in the third bedroom. But we managed because it wasn’t too hot. Overall, I’ll recommend anyone to stay here and I’ll book the place again if I’m visiting Chittagong with family.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2023
rating_comment:
Mr Harun was always very responsive to our queries. The Caretaker Mr Zahid was very Polite, Honest and always stood beside us whenever required. The place was exactly what was described in the listing.
The terrace was very beautiful and nice to relax at evening.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
This was our 4th visit to the same house since 2018. Mr Harun is a great host and very easy to communicate with him. His representative also very carrying and always available for the guests.
Looking forward to go there again as you know we can not go every year from London.
I wish the best

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: I spent a few nights in Harun's apartment with my family. The apartment was spacious with a lots of natural lights. Harun was always responsive. We had a really good stay at Harun's place and we would like to stay again in future.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2022,  · Group trip
rating_comment: It was an wonderful place to stay , great host and very cooperative and supportive team , Tasneem bhai is very soft spoken and very helpful, he replaced the refrigerator which was out of order during the stay. An amazing mesmerising morning view from the balcony. I wish all the success and keep the good job doing. Thank you Harun bhai and the team .

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2022,  · Stayed with kids
rating_comment: Harun’s caretakers were very responsive getting us supplies and were very sweet and kind. Building was safe, secured, and clean. We enjoyed our World Cup 2022 matches on the TV. We recommend Harun have coffee and tea available for a nice welcome. Bottled water too. We aren’t that concerned, but a fresh coat of paint and a new ironing board might be good. We gave five stars because we love Bangladesh and support the people.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: We LOVED our stay here, and were only sad we couldn't enjoy the space longer. This was our first time in Bangladesh, we couldn't have found a better place to stay. The flat is big, airy, with large windows in each bedroom- there is everything you might need, and more. The host and/or the caretakers have paid close attention to everything a guest might need and provided for it- from house. We loved the balcony and terrace , and enjoyed looking out into the school playground behind the apartment where one can see school children playing. Our stay was extremely comfortable, and I cannot recommend this place enough. I have to also make special mention of the caretaker, Zahid, who was so helpful and attentive with us. Harun, the host, also specially spoke to me, to ensure that we were safe and taken care of. We are so touched by the hospitality and the attention that went well beyond our expectation. There are also lots of shops within walking distance, and the neighborhood felt very safe.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: The apartment is very nice and comfortable! Location is very convenient for us, near shops and public transport. Mr. Harun is a super host! Would definitely stay here again!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
1. Excellent location in the city GEC, close to every shopping mall and places to visit, easy to get a taxi, you can also use Uber, or take a local tricycle directly, it is faster and more convenient,
2. Hygiene: The floor is clean and tidy, the kitchen is clean, you can cook, the refrigerator is very convenient to use, the most important thing is that there are no mosquitoes in this apartment compared to other places, please do not open the windows often, otherwise there will be a few
3. Price: The price is right, and it's a good value for money throughout the app.
4. House size: very spacious, three rooms, two of which have separate toilets in a living room, a toilet in a living room, two rooms have air conditioners, and there are plenty of electric fans. The air conditioner is not turned on very low. It can be cooled by about 24-26.
5. The apartment is on the 6th floor, there is Wi-Fi, and there is also an elevator. It is very convenient. There is a security service staff downstairs. You can communicate with them anytime you need. The attitude is very good.
6. Regarding the use of electricity, sometimes the electricity is cut off, but it basically does not affect it, it will call you in the next minute,
7. The room is suitable for a family trip, or traveling with relatives and friends, business travelers on business
Overall review: I highly recommend it. It's a homestay with great value for money.
